price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun bai wa Mũsã littãfi tsammaninsu* zã su shiryu.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: * Banĩ Isrã'ĩla na yanzu idan sun tuna cewa Alƙur'ãni bã shĩ ne farkon littafin sama ba, an bai wa Mũsã wani littafi, su kuma sunã alfahari da shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
